original: Arfwidsson, Anna Sofia Christina, lektor. Skara, f. 23/3/86 i Ölsremma, Älvsb. 1., av kyrkoh. Anders A. o. Alma Ahlenius. — Stud:ex. i Malmö 09, fil. kand. i Lund 13, fil. lic. 32, fil. dr, provår i Sthlm 30. Res. t. Tyskl. uppr. ggr, Engl. 14. Ämneslär. i Söderköp. 12-15, Västerviks h. läroanst. f. fl. 15-18, Djursholms h. samsk. 19-31, e. lär. resp. vik. adj. v. Gbgs v. realsk. 31-32, Malmö gosslärov. 32-33, adj. v. Gbgs flicklärov. 33, lektor i tyska o. eng. v. Skara h. a. 1. sed. 42. Skr. : Zeno oder die Legende von den heil. drei Königen (grad :avh. 40).
translated: Arfwidsson, Anna Sofia Christina, lecturer. Born on March 23, 1886 in Ölsremma, Älvsborg's 1st district, to the vicar Anders A. and Alma Ahlenius. She earned her high school degree in Malmö in 1909, Bachelor's degree from Lund in 1913, Licentiate degree in 1932 and PhD after a probationary year in Stockholm in 1930. She traveled to Germany several times and to England in 1914. She taught subjects in Söderköping from 1912-1915, Västervik's higher educational institutions from 1915-1918, Djursholm's higher secondary school from 1919-1931 as well as being a teacher and substitute deputy at Gothenburg's secondary school in 1931-1932, Malmö boy's school from 1932-1933, deputy at Gothenburg's girls' school in 1933 before becoming a German and English lecturer at Skara h. a. 1. since 1942. She has written a theses called: "Zeno or the legend of the holy three kings" (grad: passed in 1940).

education.name: PhD
education.alternateName: Zeno oder die Legende von den heil. drei Königen
